hero.heroSubtitle: Rethinking Boundaries: In Tech, In Life

aboutMe.aboutDescription: I am Lucas Tejedor, a developer at Elogroup, aspiring to further my education in the USA. This site chronicles my explorations, showcasing various projects I've undertaken over the years. My curiosity has driven me through self-directed ventures across a breadth of subjects, from neurology and psychology to mathematics and design. In a world awash with endless information, being self-taught is not merely a skill, but a fundamental necessity. This journey has granted me a unique perspective that might be valuable to you. Each new subject I explore sparks a desire to share the acquired knowledge, creating content that enriches both my understanding and that of others. This cycle of learning and teaching underscores the significant impact a self-taught individual can have, fostering personal growth and contributing to the broader societal intellectual fabric.

projectsSection.title: My Projects
projectsSection.description: Projects with medals won at least one competition.
projectsSection.certificates: Proofs can be found by clicking on the cards. If it's a page, navigate to the end to find them.

feedback.name: Anderson Cortez
feedback.subtitle: Former Undersecretary of Extension
feedback.description: The most beautiful sacrifice is the one where you sacrifice your social life, and maybe your happiness, for the sake of your dream. This is Lucas Tejedor.

feedback.name: João R. de T. Quadros
feedback.subtitle: PhD Professor at CEFET/RJ
feedback.description: Lucas Tejedor is the name of an innovative person, who has an intense light on the development and knowledge of Information Technology and the like. It won't surprise me if, soon, he becomes another brilliant mind in this world of technology, with how national, individual and human.

feedback.name: Lucas C. Gregory
feedback.subtitle: President of the Student Union
feedback.description: Many plans, strategies, dreams, and hopes. I would venture to say that this would be the definition of life. There are those who disagree. But those who know Lucas Tejedor, know that this is the definition he would give. A mind with many expectations, perspectives, and courage.

feedback.name: João T. Dias
feedback.subtitle: PhD Prof. at Cefet/RJ and researcher at CIA-Rio
feedback.description: I have had the pleasure of guiding two projects developed by Lucas. I have no doubt that he is a brilliant mind with an extreme ability to perform multiple and complex tasks with the clarity and vision of someone who performs a simple task.

otherAchievements.title: Other Achievements
otherAchievements.description: My personal accomplishments are listed below. The purpose of this website is, in addition to showing my professional skills, to maintain a repository of my achievements over the years. Therefore, there is also a need for a space to document my personal achievements, which I will list below:
